mapper.select: SELECT IDH.INFER_DETAIL_CODE, IDH.INFER_ITEM, IDH.TOTAL_QUANTITY, IDH.INFER_QUANTITY, IDH.INFER_TYPE, IDH.INFER_IMAGE, IDH.INFER_NO, IDH.INSTORE_NO, IH.INFER_APPLICATION_DATE, IH.CONFIRM_LOCATION, IH.CONFIRM_WHETHER, IH.INFER_MANAGER, IA.DISPOSAL_WHETHER, I.INSTORE_DATE FROM INFER_DETAIL_HISTORY IDH LEFT JOIN INFER_HISTORY IH ON IDH.INFER_NO = IH.INFER_NO LEFT JOIN INSTORE I ON I.INSTORE_NO = IDH.INSTORE_NO LEFT JOIN INFER_ANSWER IA ON IA.INFER_NO = IDH.INFER_NO WHERE IDH.INFER_NO = #{inferNo} ORDER BY IDH.INFER_DETAIL_CODE

SELECT IA.DISPOSAL_WHETHER, IA.ANSWER, IA.MANAGER, IA.ANSWERER, IH.INFER_APPLICATION_DATE, IH.CONFIRM_LOCATION FROM INFER_ANSWER IA LEFT JOIN INFER_HISTORY IH ON IA.INFER_NO = IH.INFER_NO WHERE IA.INFER_NO = #{inferNo}
SELECT COMPANY_NO , DIV , COMPANY_NAME , COMPANY_ADDRESS , COMPANY_TEL , BRN , REGION FROM COMPANY ORDER BY COMPANY_NO
